Package ohos.media.recorder

Class RecorderProfile

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.recorder.RecorderProfile

  • public class RecorderProfile
extends Object
    Describes the coding and decoding capabilities of the system.
    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#MEDIA

    • Constructor Detail

      • RecorderProfile

        public RecorderProfile​(int qualityLevel,
                       int durationTime,
                       int fileFormat,
                       int aCodec,
                       int aBitRate,
                       int aSampleRate,
                       int aChannels,
                       int vCodec,
                       int vFrameRate,
                       int vHeight,
                       int vWidth,
                       int vBitRate)
        A constructor used to create a RecorderProfile instance.
        Parameters:
        qualityLevel - Indicates the video quality.
        durationTime - Indicates the default recording duration.
        fileFormat - Indicates the output file format.
        aCodec - Indicates the audio codec.
        aBitRate - Indicates the audio bit rate.
        aSampleRate - Indicates the audio sampling rate.
        aChannels - Indicates the number of audio channels.
        vCodec - Indicates the video codec.
        vFrameRate - Indicates the video frame rate.
        vHeight - Indicates the video height.
        vWidth - Indicates the video width.
        vBitRate - Indicates the video bit rate.
        Since:
        1

    • Method Detail

      • getParameter

        public static RecorderProfile getParameter​(String cameraId,
                                           int qualityLevel)
        Obtains the profile of the codec used for a specified camera and video quality.
        Parameters:
        cameraId - Indicates the camera ID.
        qualityLevel - Indicates video quality.
        Returns:
        Returns the codec profile.
        Since:
        1

      • isProfile

        public static boolean isProfile​(int cameraId,
                                int qualityLevel)
        Checks if there is a profile of the codec used for a specified camera and video quality.
        Parameters:
        cameraId - Indicates the camera ID.
        qualityLevel - Indicates video quality.
        Returns:
        Returns true if it exists; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1
